attributes.action: Amend the Dangerous Dogs Act to include all breeds of dog
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Amend the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991  section 1 to remove 'dogs bred for fighting' and replace with 'all breeds of dog'.

This will cover the recent craze of teenager gang members replacing knives for animals they train and abuse to make them aggressive.

In addition it would remove the current problem when trying to identify a breed that meets the current law definition.
